attributes.action: stop the unfair rise in holiday prices during the schools holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I imagine there are many people in the same situation as myself, we are not allowed to take our children on holiday during half term and fines are in place for this too, but when you try to book a holiday during peak times the prices have doubled/tripled in some cases, how are people on benifits and low incomes supposed to be able to afford these holidays, so do we not take them then? well I think it is daylight robbery, what do you think?

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/six-term-school/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
